directory_list_screen:search_input.name: directory_list_screen:search_input
directory_list_screen:search_input.description: Search input field for searching folders in the directory list screen.
directory_list_screen:search_input.effect: set text to update the search input field, which filters the directory list to show directories matching the search term.

directory_list_screen:open_camera_button.name: directory_list_screen:open_camera_button
directory_list_screen:open_camera_button.description: Button to open the camera from the directory list screen.
directory_list_screen:open_camera_button.effect: tap to navigate to the action_selection_screen, which prompts the user to complete an action using one of the available applications. It contains a title bar with the text 'Complete action using', a list of available applications, and buttons labeled 'Just once' and 'Always'.

directory_list_screen:show_all_folders_b.name: directory_list_screen:show_all_folders_button
directory_list_screen:show_all_folders_b.description: Button to show all folder content in the directory list screen.
directory_list_screen:show_all_folders_b.effect: tap to navigate to the all_folders_contents_screen, which displays the contents of all folders. The screen includes a toolbar with a search input field and buttons for toggling filename visibility, switching to folder view, and more options. The main area displays media items grouped by date, each represented by a thumbnail and a button indicating the media name, with some media items having an additional icon indicating their type.
directory_list_screen:show_all_folders_b.element:
<button alt="Show all folders content" id="14" resource_id="show_all">
</button>

directory_list_screen:more_options_butto.name: directory_list_screen:more_options_button
directory_list_screen:more_options_butto.description: Button to open more options in the directory list screen.
directory_list_screen:more_options_butto.effect: tap to navigate to the options_popup_screen, which is a popup window that includes options for sorting, filtering media, changing view type, temporarily showing hidden items, temporarily showing excluded items, creating a new folder, adjusting column count, accessing settings, and viewing about information.

directory_list_screen:directories_grid.name: directory_list_screen:directories_grid
directory_list_screen:directories_grid.description: A grid of directory items, each containing a thumbnail, a shadow overlay, and buttons indicating the directory name and the number of photos within the directory.
directory_list_screen:directories_grid.effect: tap to navigate to the directory_contents_screen, which displays the contents of a selected directory. The screen includes a toolbar with a search input field and buttons for toggling filename visibility, sorting by criteria, and more options. The main area is prepared to display the media items within the selected directory.

directory_list_screen:directory_item.name: directory_list_screen:directory_item
directory_list_screen:directory_item.description: An individual directory item within the directories_grid, containing a thumbnail, a shadow overlay, and buttons indicating the directory name and the number of photos within the directory.

directory_list_screen:directory_name_but.name: directory_list_screen:directory_name_button
directory_list_screen:directory_name_but.description: Button indicating the name of the directory within a directory item.

directory_list_screen:photo_count_button.name: directory_list_screen:photo_count_button
directory_list_screen:photo_count_button.description: Button indicating the number of photos within the directory in a directory item.

directory_list_screen:search_icon_button.name: directory_list_screen:search_icon_button
directory_list_screen:search_icon_button.description: Button to activate the search input field in the directory list screen.

directory_list_screen:directory_thumbnai.name: directory_list_screen:directory_thumbnail_button
directory_list_screen:directory_thumbnai.description: Button displaying the thumbnail of the directory within a directory item.

directory_list_screen:directory_shadow_b.name: directory_list_screen:directory_shadow_button
directory_list_screen:directory_shadow_b.description: Button displaying the shadow overlay of the directory within a directory item.

directory_list_screen:top_toolbar.name: directory_list_screen:top_toolbar
directory_list_screen:top_toolbar.description: Container for the top toolbar elements including search icon, search input, and buttons for camera, show all folders, and more options.

directory_list_screen:directory_bottom_h.name: directory_list_screen:directory_bottom_holder
directory_list_screen:directory_bottom_h.description: Container for the directory name and photo count buttons within a directory item.

directory_list_screen:track_view.name: directory_list_screen:track_view
directory_list_screen:track_view.description: Track view for fast scrolling within the directories grid.

directory_list_screen:main_layout.name: directory_list_screen:main_layout
directory_list_screen:main_layout.description: Main layout container for the directory list screen.

directory_list_screen:frame_layout.name: directory_list_screen:frame_layout
directory_list_screen:frame_layout.description: Frame layout container within the main layout.

directory_list_screen:action_bar_root.name: directory_list_screen:action_bar_root
directory_list_screen:action_bar_root.description: Root container for the action bar.

directory_list_screen:content.name: directory_list_screen:content
directory_list_screen:content.description: Content container within the action bar root.

directory_list_screen:directories_coordi.name: directory_list_screen:directories_coordinator
directory_list_screen:directories_coordi.description: Scrollbar for the directories coordinator layout.

directory_list_screen:main_menu.name: directory_list_screen:main_menu
directory_list_screen:main_menu.description: Main menu container within the directories coordinator.

directory_list_screen:top_app_bar_layout.name: directory_list_screen:top_app_bar_layout
directory_list_screen:top_app_bar_layout.description: Top app bar layout containing the toolbar elements.

directory_list_screen:top_toolbar_holder.name: directory_list_screen:top_toolbar_holder
directory_list_screen:top_toolbar_holder.description: Holder for the top toolbar elements including search icon, search input, and buttons.

directory_list_screen:toolbar_buttons_la.name: directory_list_screen:toolbar_buttons_layout
directory_list_screen:toolbar_buttons_la.description: Layout container for the toolbar buttons including open camera, show all folders, and more options.

directory_list_screen:directories_holder.name: directory_list_screen:directories_holder
directory_list_screen:directories_holder.description: Holder for the directories refresh layout and fast scroller.

directory_list_screen:directories_refres.name: directory_list_screen:directories_refresh_layout
directory_list_screen:directories_refres.description: View group for refreshing the directories layout.

directory_list_screen:directories_fastsc.name: directory_list_screen:directories_fastscroller
directory_list_screen:directories_fastsc.description: Fast scroller for quickly navigating through the directories grid.

directory_list_screen:switch_search_butt.name: directory_list_screen:switch_search_button
directory_list_screen:switch_search_butt.description: Button to switch to file search across all visible folders.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='directories_switch_searching' and text()='Switch to file search across all visible folders']
directory_list_screen:switch_search_butt.element:
<button id="17" resource_id="directories_switch_searching">
 Switch to file search across all visible folders
</button>

directory_list_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <scrollbar resource_id="directories_coordinator">
      <linearlayout resource_id="main_menu">
       <linearlayout resource_id="top_app_bar_layout">
        <relativelayout resource_id="top_toolbar_holder">
         <imageview resource_id="top_toolbar_search_icon">
         </imageview>
         <input resource_id="top_toolbar_search"/>
         <viewgroup resource_id="top_toolbar">
          <linearlayoutcompat>
           <button resource_id="open_camera">
           </button>
           <button resource_id="show_all">
           </button>
           <button>
           </button>
          </linearlayoutcompat>
         </viewgroup>
        </relativelayout>
       </linearlayout>
      </linearlayout>
      <relativelayout resource_id="directories_holder">
       <viewgroup resource_id="directories_refresh_layout">
        <relativelayout resource_id="directories_fastscroller">
         <recyclerview resource_id="directories_grid">
          <relativelayout resource_id="dir_holder">
           <imageview resource_id="dir_thumbnail">
           </imageview>
           <imageview resource_id="dir_shadow_holder">
           </imageview>
           <linearlayout resource_id="dir_bottom_holder">
            <button resource_id="dir_name">
            </button>
            <button resource_id="photo_cnt">
            </button>
           </linearlayout>
          </relativelayout>
         </recyclerview>
         <linearlayout resource_id="trackView">
         </linearlayout>
        </relativelayout>
       </viewgroup>
      </relativelayout>
     </scrollbar>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

action_selection_screen:title.name: action_selection_screen:title
action_selection_screen:title.description: The title bar displaying the text 'Complete action using'.

action_selection_screen:application_list.name: action_selection_screen:application_list
action_selection_screen:application_list.description: A list of available applications represented by icons and buttons within a TabHost.

action_selection_screen:application_butt.name: action_selection_screen:application_button
action_selection_screen:application_butt.description: A button representing an available application within the application_list.

action_selection_screen:just_once_button.name: action_selection_screen:just_once_button
action_selection_screen:just_once_button.description: A button labeled 'Just once' at the bottom of the screen.
action_selection_screen:just_once_button.effect: tap to navigate to the directory_list_screen, which displays a list of directories with a toolbar containing a search input field and several buttons, and a grid of directory items.

action_selection_screen:always_button.name: action_selection_screen:always_button
action_selection_screen:always_button.description: A button labeled 'Always' at the bottom of the screen.

options_popup_screen:options_list.name: options_popup_screen:options_list
options_popup_screen:options_list.description: A list of options presented as buttons within a ListView. The options include sorting, filtering media, changing view type, temporarily showing hidden items, temporarily showing excluded items, creating a new folder, adjusting column count, accessing settings, and viewing about information.
options_popup_screen:options_list.effect: tap to navigate to the column_count_screen, which displays options to adjust the number of columns. It contains a scrollable area with checkboxes for selecting the number of columns, ranging from 1 to 15 columns. The currently selected option is highlighted.
xpath:
//*[text()='Sort by






Filter media






Change view type






Temporarily show hidden






Temporarily show excluded






Create new folder






Column count






Settings






About']

options_popup_screen:sort_by_button.name: options_popup_screen:sort_by_button
options_popup_screen:sort_by_button.description: A button within the options_list that allows the user to sort items.

options_popup_screen:filter_media_button.name: options_popup_screen:filter_media_button
options_popup_screen:filter_media_button.description: A button within the options_list that allows the user to filter media items.

options_popup_screen:change_view_type_bu.name: options_popup_screen:change_view_type_button
options_popup_screen:change_view_type_bu.description: A button within the options_list that allows the user to change the view type.

options_popup_screen:temporarily_show_hi.name: options_popup_screen:temporarily_show_hidden_button
options_popup_screen:temporarily_show_hi.description: A button within the options_list that allows the user to temporarily show hidden items.

options_popup_screen:temporarily_show_ex.name: options_popup_screen:temporarily_show_excluded_button
options_popup_screen:temporarily_show_ex.description: A button within the options_list that allows the user to temporarily show excluded items.

options_popup_screen:create_new_folder_b.name: options_popup_screen:create_new_folder_button
options_popup_screen:create_new_folder_b.description: A button within the options_list that allows the user to create a new folder.

options_popup_screen:column_count_button.name: options_popup_screen:column_count_button
options_popup_screen:column_count_button.description: A button within the options_list that allows the user to adjust the column count.

options_popup_screen:settings_button.name: options_popup_screen:settings_button
options_popup_screen:settings_button.description: A button within the options_list that allows the user to access settings.

options_popup_screen:about_button.name: options_popup_screen:about_button
options_popup_screen:about_button.description: A button within the options_list that allows the user to view about information.

sorting_options_screen:dialog_title.name: sorting_options_screen:dialog_title
sorting_options_screen:dialog_title.description: The title of the sorting options dialog.

sorting_options_screen:sorting_criteria_.name: sorting_options_screen:sorting_criteria_list
sorting_options_screen:sorting_criteria_.description: A list of sorting criteria represented by checkboxes. The criteria include options such as 'Name', 'Path', 'Size', 'Last modified', 'Date taken', 'Random', and 'Custom'.
sorting_options_screen:sorting_criteria_.effect: The sorting criteria 'Name' is selected, and the sorting options screen remains displayed with the updated selection.
xpath:
//*[@resource_id='sorting_dialog_radio_sorting' and text()='Name
Path
Size
Last modified
Date taken
Random
Custom']

sorting_options_screen:sorting_order_lis.name: sorting_options_screen:sorting_order_list
sorting_options_screen:sorting_order_lis.description: A list of sorting order options represented by checkboxes. The options include 'Ascending' and 'Descending'.

sorting_options_screen:cancel_button.name: sorting_options_screen:cancel_button
sorting_options_screen:cancel_button.description: The button to cancel the sorting options dialog.
sorting_options_screen:cancel_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the directory_list_screen, which displays a list of directories with a toolbar containing a search input field and several buttons, and a grid of directory items.

sorting_options_screen:ok_button.name: sorting_options_screen:ok_button
sorting_options_screen:ok_button.description: The button to confirm the sorting options.
sorting_options_screen:ok_button.effect: tap to navigate back to the directory_list_screen, which displays a list of directories with a toolbar containing a search input field and several buttons, and a grid of directory items.

sorting_options_screen:sort_numeric_chec.name: sorting_options_screen:sort_numeric_checkbox
sorting_options_screen:sort_numeric_chec.description: Checkbox to sort numeric parts by actual value.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='sorting_dialog_numeric_sorting' and text()='Sort numeric parts by actual value']
sorting_options_screen:sort_numeric_chec.element:
<checkbox id="25" resource_id="sorting_dialog_numeric_sorting">
 Sort numeric parts by actual value
</checkbox>

filter_media_screen:dialog_title_textvie.name: filter_media_screen:dialog_title_textview
filter_media_screen:dialog_title_textvie.description: Displays the title of the filter media dialog.

filter_media_screen:filter_media_dialog_.name: filter_media_screen:filter_media_dialog_holder
filter_media_screen:filter_media_dialog_.description: A list of media type checkboxes for filtering media. Each checkbox represents a media type option.
filter_media_screen:filter_media_dialog_.effect: tap to deselect the GIFs option in the filter_media_screen, which displays filtering options for media.
xpath:
//*[@resource_id='filter_media_dialog_holder' and text()='Images
Videos
GIFs
RAW images
SVGs
Portraits']

filter_media_screen:cancel_button.name: filter_media_screen:cancel_button
filter_media_screen:cancel_button.description: Button to cancel the filter media operation and return to the previous screen.
filter_media_screen:cancel_button.effect: tap to navigate to the directory_list_screen, which displays a list of directories with a toolbar containing a search input field, buttons for opening the camera, showing all folder content, and more options. Below the toolbar, there is a grid of directory items with thumbnails, shadow overlays, directory names, photo counts, and a button to switch to file search across all visible folders.

filter_media_screen:ok_button.name: filter_media_screen:ok_button
filter_media_screen:ok_button.description: Button to confirm the filter media operation and apply the selected filters.
filter_media_screen:ok_button.effect: tap to confirm the filter media operation and apply the selected filters.

filter_media_screen:filter_media_images_.name: filter_media_screen:filter_media_images_checkbox
filter_media_screen:filter_media_images_.description: Checkbox to select or deselect the Images media type for filtering.

filter_media_screen:filter_media_videos_.name: filter_media_screen:filter_media_videos_checkbox
filter_media_screen:filter_media_videos_.description: Checkbox to select or deselect the Videos media type for filtering.

filter_media_screen:filter_media_gifs_ch.name: filter_media_screen:filter_media_gifs_checkbox
filter_media_screen:filter_media_gifs_ch.description: Checkbox to select or deselect the GIFs media type for filtering.

filter_media_screen:filter_media_raws_ch.name: filter_media_screen:filter_media_raws_checkbox
filter_media_screen:filter_media_raws_ch.description: Checkbox to select or deselect the RAW images media type for filtering.

filter_media_screen:filter_media_svgs_ch.name: filter_media_screen:filter_media_svgs_checkbox
filter_media_screen:filter_media_svgs_ch.description: Checkbox to select or deselect the SVGs media type for filtering.

filter_media_screen:filter_media_portrai.name: filter_media_screen:filter_media_portraits_checkbox
filter_media_screen:filter_media_portrai.description: Checkbox to select or deselect the Portraits media type for filtering.

change_view_type_screen:view_type_option.name: change_view_type_screen:view_type_options
change_view_type_screen:view_type_option.description: A list of radio buttons for selecting the view type. Options include 'Grid' and 'List'.
change_view_type_screen:view_type_option.effect: tap to select the list view type option, which is now selected by default.

change_view_type_screen:group_direct_sub.name: change_view_type_screen:group_direct_subfolders_checkbox
change_view_type_screen:group_direct_sub.description: A checkbox for grouping direct subfolders.

change_view_type_screen:cancel_button.name: change_view_type_screen:cancel_button
change_view_type_screen:cancel_button.description: A button to cancel the view type change and return to the previous screen.
change_view_type_screen:cancel_button.effect: tap to navigate to the directory_list_screen, which displays a list of directories with a toolbar containing a search input field and several buttons, and a grid of directory items.

change_view_type_screen:ok_button.name: change_view_type_screen:ok_button
change_view_type_screen:ok_button.description: A button to confirm the view type change and apply the selected options.
change_view_type_screen:ok_button.effect: tap to confirm the view type change and apply the selected options, navigating to the directory_list_screen, which displays a list of directories with a toolbar containing a search input field and several buttons, and a grid of directory items.

change_view_type_screen:view_type_grid_c.name: change_view_type_screen:view_type_grid_checkbox
change_view_type_screen:view_type_grid_c.description: A checkbox for selecting the grid view type option.

change_view_type_screen:view_type_list_c.name: change_view_type_screen:view_type_list_checkbox
change_view_type_screen:view_type_list_c.description: A checkbox for selecting the list view type option.

change_view_type_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <linearlayoutcompat resource_id="parentPanel">
      <framelayout resource_id="customPanel">
       <framelayout resource_id="custom">
        <scrollview resource_id="change_view_type_dialog_scrollview">
         <linearlayout resource_id="change_view_type_dialog_holder">
          <radiogroup resource_id="change_view_type_dialog_radio">
           <checkbox resource_id="change_view_type_dialog_radio_grid">
           </checkbox>
           <checkbox resource_id="change_view_type_dialog_radio_list">
           </checkbox>
          </radiogroup>
          <imageview resource_id="group_direct_subfolders_divider">
          </imageview>
          <checkbox resource_id="change_view_type_dialog_group_direct_subfolders">
          </checkbox>
         </linearlayout>
        </scrollview>
       </framelayout>
      </framelayout>
      <scrollview resource_id="buttonPanel">
       <linearlayout>
        <button resource_id="button2">
        </button>
        <button resource_id="button1">
        </button>
       </linearlayout>
      </scrollview>
     </linearlayoutcompat>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

folder_selection_screen:dialog_title_tex.name: folder_selection_screen:dialog_title_textview
folder_selection_screen:dialog_title_tex.description: Displays the title of the dialog, indicating the purpose of the screen.

folder_selection_screen:breadcrumb_text.name: folder_selection_screen:breadcrumb_text
folder_selection_screen:breadcrumb_text.description: A button in the breadcrumb navigation bar, used to navigate to the parent directory or storage selection.
folder_selection_screen:breadcrumb_text.effect: tap to navigate to the storage_selection_screen, which allows the user to select storage options including 'Internal' or 'SD Card'.

folder_selection_screen:filepicker_list.description: A list of folders displayed in the main area, each represented by an icon, a name, and details about the number of items within the folder.

folder_selection_screen:list_item_detail.name: folder_selection_screen:list_item_details
folder_selection_screen:list_item_detail.description: Details about the number of items within the folder, presented as a button within the filepicker_list.

folder_selection_screen:ok_button.name: folder_selection_screen:ok_button

storage_selection_screen:title.name: storage_selection_screen:title
storage_selection_screen:title.description: The title of the screen, indicating the purpose of the screen as 'Select storage'.

storage_selection_screen:storage_options.name: storage_selection_screen:storage_options
storage_selection_screen:storage_options.description: A list of radio buttons for selecting storage options. The options include 'Internal' and 'SD Card'.
storage_selection_screen:storage_options.effect: tap to navigate to the folder_selection_internal_screen, which allows the user to select a folder within the 'Internal' storage. The screen includes a title bar, a breadcrumb navigation bar, a list of folders, and 'Cancel' and 'OK' buttons.

storage_selection_screen:internal_storag.description: A radio button for selecting the 'Internal' storage option.

storage_selection_screen:sd_card_storage.name: storage_selection_screen:sd_card_storage_option
storage_selection_screen:sd_card_storage.description: A radio button for selecting the 'SD Card' storage option.

folder_selection_sd_card_screen:dialog_t.description: Displays the title of the dialog, indicating the user should select a folder.

folder_selection_sd_card_screen:breadcru.description: Button in the breadcrumb navigation bar labeled 'SD Card'.

folder_selection_sd_card_screen:folder_l.description: A list of folders within the 'SD Card' storage. Each folder is represented by an icon, a name, and details about the number of items within the folder.

folder_selection_sd_card_screen:folder_d.name: folder_selection_sd_card_screen:folder_details

folder_selection_internal_screen:cancel_.name: folder_selection_internal_screen:cancel_button
folder_selection_internal_screen:cancel_.description: A button to cancel the folder selection and close the dialog.

folder_selection_internal_screen:ok_butt.description: A button to confirm the folder selection and proceed to the next screen.
folder_selection_internal_screen:ok_butt.effect: tap to navigate to the create_new_folder_screen, which allows the user to create a new folder by entering the folder path and name.

create_new_folder_screen:title_text.name: create_new_folder_screen:title_text
create_new_folder_screen:title_text.description: Displays the title of the screen, indicating the purpose of creating a new folder.

create_new_folder_screen:folder_path_inp.name: create_new_folder_screen:folder_path_input
create_new_folder_screen:folder_path_inp.description: Input field displaying the current path where the new folder will be created.

create_new_folder_screen:folder_name_inp.name: create_new_folder_screen:folder_name_input
create_new_folder_screen:folder_name_inp.description: Input field allowing the user to enter the name of the new folder.
create_new_folder_screen:folder_name_inp.effect: set text to update the folder name input field.

create_new_folder_screen:cancel_button.name: create_new_folder_screen:cancel_button
create_new_folder_screen:cancel_button.description: Button to cancel the folder creation process and return to the previous screen.
create_new_folder_screen:cancel_button.effect: tap to navigate to the directory_list_screen, which displays a list of directories with a toolbar containing a search input field and several buttons, and a grid of directory items.

create_new_folder_screen:ok_button.name: create_new_folder_screen:ok_button
create_new_folder_screen:ok_button.description: Button to confirm the folder creation process.
create_new_folder_screen:ok_button.effect: tap to confirm the folder creation process and navigate to the directory_list_screen, which displays a list of directories with a toolbar containing a search input field and several buttons, and a grid of directory items.

column_count_screen:column_options_list.name: column_count_screen:column_options_list
column_count_screen:column_options_list.description: A scrollable list of checkboxes for selecting the number of columns, ranging from 1 to 15 columns. The currently selected option is highlighted.
column_count_screen:column_options_list.effect: tap to select the 4 columns option, updating the number of columns displayed.

      <framelayout resource_id="customPanel">
       <framelayout resource_id="custom">
        <scrollbar resource_id="dialog_radio_holder">
         <radiogroup resource_id="dialog_radio_group">
          <checkbox>
          </checkbox>
         </radiogroup>
        </scrollbar>
       </framelayout>
      </framelayout>
     </linearlayoutcompat>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scrolling_options:back_button
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.description: A button in the toolbar to navigate back to the previous screen.
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.effect: tap to navigate back to the directory_list_screen, which displays a list of directories with a toolbar containing a search input field, buttons for opening the camera, showing all folder content, and more options. Below the toolbar, there is a grid of directory items with thumbnails, shadow overlays, directory names, and the number of photos within each directory. A button is also present to switch to file search across all visible folders.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scrolling_options:title
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.description: The title of the settings screen displayed in the toolbar.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scrolling_options:settings_scrollview
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.description: A scrollable area containing various settings sections.
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.effect: scroll down to reveal more settings options in the settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options, which includes video settings, thumbnail settings, and scrolling settings.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.effect: tap to navigate to the customize_colors_screen, which allows the user to customize various color settings including theme, text color, background color, primary color, and app icon color.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scrolling_options:file_loading_priority_label
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.description: A button to set the file loading priority.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scrolling_options:file_loading_priority_button
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.description: A button to select the file loading speed.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scrolling_options:manage_included_folders_button
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.description: A button to manage included folders.
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.effect: tap to navigate to the manage_included_folders_screen, which allows the user to manage included folders. It contains a toolbar with a back button and a title 'Included folders'. Below the toolbar, there is a button to add a folder. The main area displays a list of included folders, each represented by an icon and a name. If no folders are included, a placeholder message is shown.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scrolling_options:manage_excluded_folders_button
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.description: A button to manage excluded folders.
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scr.effect: tap to navigate to the manage_excluded_folders_screen, which allows the user to manage excluded folders. It contains a toolbar with a back button and a title 'Excluded folders'. Below the toolbar, there is a button to add a folder. The main area displays a list of excluded folders, each represented by an icon and a name. If no folders are excluded, a placeholder message is shown.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:folder_thumbnail_style_option_button
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: Button to select the square folder thumbnail style.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:back_button
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: Button to navigate back to the previous screen.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:settings_title
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: Title text displaying 'Settings'.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:settings_scrollbar
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: Scrollbar for scrolling through the settings options.

Allow controlling video volume and brightness with gestures
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:settings_options_list
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: A list of settings options including video settings, thumbnail settings, and scrolling settings.
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.effect: tap to toggle the setting for remembering the last video playback position.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:videos_label
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: Label text for the videos settings section.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:video_settings_list
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: A list of video settings options including autoplay, remember last position, loop, open on separate screen, and allow gestures.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:videos_divider
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: Divider separating the video settings section from the thumbnail settings section.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:thumbnails_label
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: Label text for the thumbnails settings section.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:thumbnail_settings_list
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: A list of thumbnail settings options including crop thumbnails, file thumbnail style, and folder thumbnail style.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:thumbnails_divider
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: Divider separating the thumbnail settings section from the scrolling settings section.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:scrolling_label
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: Label text for the scrolling settings section.

settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.name: settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_options:scrolling_settings_list
settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_opt.description: A list of scrolling settings options including horizontal scrolling.

file_thumbnail_style_screen:settings_opt.name: file_thumbnail_style_screen:settings_options
file_thumbnail_style_screen:settings_opt.description: A scrollable list of settings options for file thumbnail style, including thumbnail spacing, rounded corners, animating GIFs, showing video durations, showing image file types, and marking favorite items. Each option is represented by a button or checkbox.
xpath:
//*[@resource_id='dialog_scrollview' and text()='Thumbnail spacing
1x


Rounded corners


Animate GIFs at thumbnails


Show video durations


Show image file types


Mark favorite items']

file_thumbnail_style_screen:cancel_butto.name: file_thumbnail_style_screen:cancel_button
file_thumbnail_style_screen:cancel_butto.description: A button to cancel the current settings and return to the previous screen.
file_thumbnail_style_screen:cancel_butto.effect: tap to navigate to the settings_screen_with_video_thumbnail_scrolling_options, which displays various settings options including video settings, thumbnail settings, and scrolling settings.

file_thumbnail_style_screen:ok_button.name: file_thumbnail_style_screen:ok_button
file_thumbnail_style_screen:ok_button.description: A button to confirm the current settings and apply the changes.

file_thumbnail_style_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <linearlayoutcompat resource_id="parentPanel">
      <framelayout resource_id="customPanel">
       <framelayout resource_id="custom">
        <scrollview resource_id="dialog_scrollview">
         <linearlayout resource_id="dialog_holder">
          <relativelayout resource_id="dialog_file_style_spacing_holder">
           <button resource_id="dialog_file_style_spacing_label">
           </button>
           <button resource_id="dialog_file_style_spacing">
           </button>
          </relativelayout>
          <relativelayout resource_id="dialog_file_style_rounded_corners_holder">
           <checkbox resource_id="dialog_file_style_rounded_corners">
           </checkbox>
          </relativelayout>
          <relativelayout resource_id="dialog_file_style_animate_gifs_holder">
           <checkbox resource_id="dialog_file_style_animate_gifs">
           </checkbox>
          </relativelayout>
          <relativelayout resource_id="dialog_file_style_show_thumbnail_video_duration_holder">
           <checkbox resource_id="dialog_file_style_show_thumbnail_video_duration">
           </checkbox>
          </relativelayout>
          <relativelayout resource_id="dialog_file_style_show_thumbnail_file_types_holder">
           <checkbox resource_id="dialog_file_style_show_thumbnail_file_types">
           </checkbox>
          </relativelayout>
          <relativelayout resource_id="dialog_file_style_mark_favorite_items_holder">
           <checkbox resource_id="dialog_file_style_mark_favorite_items">
           </checkbox>
          </relativelayout>
         </linearlayout>
        </scrollview>
       </framelayout>
      </framelayout>
      <scrollview resource_id="buttonPanel">
       <linearlayout>
        <button resource_id="button2">
        </button>
        <button resource_id="button1">
        </button>
       </linearlayout>
      </scrollview>
     </linearlayoutcompat>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

directory_contents_screen:search_input.name: directory_contents_screen:search_input
directory_contents_screen:search_input.description: An input field in the toolbar for searching within the current directory.

directory_contents_screen:toggle_filenam.name: directory_contents_screen:toggle_filename_button
directory_contents_screen:toggle_filenam.description: A button in the toolbar to toggle the visibility of filenames.

directory_contents_screen:sort_button.name: directory_contents_screen:sort_button
directory_contents_screen:sort_button.description: A button in the toolbar to sort the directory contents by various criteria.

directory_contents_screen:more_options_b.name: directory_contents_screen:more_options_button
directory_contents_screen:more_options_b.description: A button in the toolbar to access more options for managing the directory contents.

directory_contents_screen:media_items_li.name: directory_contents_screen:media_items_list
directory_contents_screen:media_items_li.description: A list of media items within the selected directory. Each media item can be interacted with to view or manage its details.

directory_contents_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <scrollbar resource_id="media_coordinator">
      <linearlayout resource_id="media_menu">
       <linearlayout resource_id="top_app_bar_layout">
        <relativelayout resource_id="top_toolbar_holder">
         <imageview resource_id="top_toolbar_search_icon">
         </imageview>
         <input resource_id="top_toolbar_search"/>
         <viewgroup resource_id="top_toolbar">
          <linearlayoutcompat>
           <button resource_id="toggle_filename">
           </button>
           <button resource_id="sort">
           </button>
           <button>
           </button>
          </linearlayoutcompat>
         </viewgroup>
        </relativelayout>
       </linearlayout>
      </linearlayout>
      <relativelayout resource_id="media_holder">
      </relativelayout>
     </scrollbar>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

all_folders_contents_screen:search_input.name: all_folders_contents_screen:search_input
all_folders_contents_screen:search_input.description: Search input field in the toolbar for searching files.

all_folders_contents_screen:toggle_filen.name: all_folders_contents_screen:toggle_filename_button
all_folders_contents_screen:toggle_filen.description: Button to toggle the visibility of filenames in the media items.
all_folders_contents_screen:toggle_filen.effect: tap to toggle the visibility of filenames in the media items on the all_folders_contents_screen.

all_folders_contents_screen:switch_to_fo.name: all_folders_contents_screen:switch_to_folder_view_button
all_folders_contents_screen:switch_to_fo.description: Button to switch the view to folder view.
all_folders_contents_screen:switch_to_fo.effect: tap to navigate to the directory_list_screen, which displays a list of directories. The screen includes a toolbar with a search input field and several buttons including options to open the camera, show all folder content, and more options. Below the toolbar, there is a grid of directory items, each containing a thumbnail, a shadow overlay, and buttons indicating the directory name and the number of photos within the directory. A button is also present to switch to file search across all visible folders.
all_folders_contents_screen:switch_to_fo.element:
<button alt="Switch to folder view" id="14" resource_id="folder_view">
</button>

all_folders_contents_screen:more_options.name: all_folders_contents_screen:more_options_button
all_folders_contents_screen:more_options.description: Button to open more options in the toolbar.

all_folders_contents_screen:media_items_.name: all_folders_contents_screen:media_items_list
all_folders_contents_screen:media_items_.description: A list of media items grouped by date. Each media item is represented by a thumbnail and a button indicating the media name. Some media items also have an additional icon indicating their type (e.g., video).

all_folders_contents_screen:date_section.name: all_folders_contents_screen:date_section_button
all_folders_contents_screen:date_section.description: Button indicating the date section of the media items.

all_folders_contents_screen:media_item_b.name: all_folders_contents_screen:media_item_button
all_folders_contents_screen:media_item_b.description: Button representing an individual media item within the media_items_list.

all_folders_contents_screen:media_item_h.name: all_folders_contents_screen:media_item_holder
all_folders_contents_screen:media_item_h.description: A list of media item holders within the media_items_list. Each media item holder contains a thumbnail, a button indicating the media name, and optionally an additional icon indicating the media type (e.g., video).

all_folders_contents_screen:medium_thumb.name: all_folders_contents_screen:medium_thumbnail
all_folders_contents_screen:medium_thumb.description: The thumbnail image of a media item within the media_item_holder.

all_folders_contents_screen:play_portrai.name: all_folders_contents_screen:play_portrait_outline
all_folders_contents_screen:play_portrai.description: An icon indicating that the media item is a video within the media_item_holder.

all_folders_contents_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <scrollbar resource_id="media_coordinator">
      <linearlayout resource_id="media_menu">
       <linearlayout resource_id="top_app_bar_layout">
        <relativelayout resource_id="top_toolbar_holder">
         <imageview resource_id="top_toolbar_search_icon">
         </imageview>
         <input resource_id="top_toolbar_search"/>
         <viewgroup resource_id="top_toolbar">
          <linearlayoutcompat>
           <button resource_id="toggle_filename">
           </button>
           <button resource_id="folder_view">
           </button>
           <button>
           </button>
          </linearlayoutcompat>
         </viewgroup>
        </relativelayout>
       </linearlayout>
      </linearlayout>
      <relativelayout resource_id="media_holder">
       <viewgroup resource_id="media_refresh_layout">
        <relativelayout resource_id="media_fastscroller">
         <recyclerview resource_id="media_grid">
          <button resource_id="thumbnail_section">
          </button>
          <relativelayout resource_id="media_item_holder">
          </relativelayout>
         </recyclerview>
         <linearlayout resource_id="trackView">
         </linearlayout>
        </relativelayout>
       </viewgroup>
      </relativelayout>
     </scrollbar>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>
